typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string,
		salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> newEmp
source(output(
		empid as string,
		name as string,
		country as string,
		department as string,
		salary as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> empSink
newEmp keyGenerate(output(empid as long),
	startAt: 1L) ~> SurrogateKey1
empSink aggregate(MaxID = max(toInteger(empid))) ~> Aggregate1
SurrogateKey1, Aggregate1 join(1==1,
	joinType:'cross',
	broadcast: 'auto')~> Join1
Join1 derive(empid = toString(empid + MaxID)) ~> DerivedColumn1
empSink, DerivedColumn1 union(byName: true)~> Union1
Union1 select(mapColumn(
		empid,
		name,
		country,
		department,
		salary
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> Select1
Select1 sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['employees.csv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> sink1
